name: Atari 40th competition game 4. Pitfall 2 arcade demake

description:
Atari 40th competition game 4. Pitfall 2 - Quest for Cup that heals

Atari 40th competition game 4. Pitfall 2 
Find the secret key in each of the four games
1. Asteroids - Quest for Sword of Freedom
2. Berzerk - Quest for Shield of Faith
3. Dragonfire - Quest for Helmet of Justice
4. Pitfall 2 - Quest for Cup that heals

Created by Wolron, adaption by RRD
